title: Frontend Engineer Intern
description: This internship program is an excellent opportunity for aspiring front-end engineers to hone their skills in developing web applications with an emphasis on design and user experience. As part of this 3 month internship program, successful applicants will collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team to create an optimal web experience for users, while optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS
